description: This file defines authentication-related API routes for user registration and login, using Express.js. It handles user creation, login verification, password hashing, token generation, and validates request payloads with Joi.

classes.name: Router
classes.description: Express Router instance used to define route handlers.

methods.name: /register (POST)
methods.description: Registers a new user after validating input; hashes password; stores user; issues JWT token.

methods.name: /login (POST)
methods.description: Authenticates user credentials; issues JWT token if valid.
